title: Professional Mail Server
description: Enterprise-grade self-hosted email with Mailcow. Full Docker setup with SSL, spam protection, DNS, and webmail for a secure, private, production-ready system.
detailedDescription: Take full control of your email infrastructure with a professionally deployed Mailcow mail server. I specialize in building secure, containerized email systems that give you complete ownership and privacy. This comprehensive service includes: Docker-based Mailcow installation, automatic SSL/TLS certificates via Let's Encrypt, complete DNS configuration (DKIM, SPF, DMARC for maximum deliverability), Rspamd spam filtering with ClamAV antivirus protection, modern Roundcube webmail interface, and security hardening. Perfect for businesses, startups, agencies, and IT professionals who demand data privacy, reliable performance, and independence from third-party email providers. Your mail server will be fully operational, optimized for deliverability, and configured according to industry best practices. With years of experience in mail server administration and Docker containerization, I ensure your email system runs smoothly from day one.

packages.name: Basic Setup
features: Complete Mailcow Docker stack installation on your server
Single domain configuration with DKIM, SPF, and DMARC records
Automated SSL/TLS certificates (Let's Encrypt) with auto-renewal
Admin panel setup with up to 10 user mailboxes
Rspamd spam filtering and ClamAV antivirus protection
Roundcube webmail interface configuration
Basic firewall rules (UFW/iptables) and security hardening
Mobile device sync support (IMAP/SMTP)
Email aliases and forwarding setup
Configuration documentation provided

packages.name: Advanced Setup
features: Full Mailcow deployment with optimized Docker configuration
Multi-domain support (up to 5 domains) with complete DNS setup
Advanced spam protection with custom Rspamd rules and greylisting
Branded Roundcube webmail with your company logo and colors
Automated daily backups (local storage with 14-day retention)
Docker container monitoring with Watchtower for automatic updates
Fail2ban integration for brute-force protection
Email authentication testing and deliverability optimization
Catch-all addresses and distribution lists
IMAP/SMTP quota management per user
Email filtering rules and autoresponders
Comprehensive admin documentation and 1-hour training session
Post-delivery configuration review and optimization

packages.name: Enterprise Solution
features: High-availability Mailcow setup with container redundancy planning
Unlimited domain support with automated DNS propagation checks
Enterprise-grade security: hardened firewall, fail2ban, and intrusion detection
Real-time monitoring dashboard with Grafana & email/SMS alerting system
Encrypted automated backups to remote location or AWS S3/compatible storage
Complete mailbox migration from Gmail, Office 365, cPanel, Plesk, or IMAP
SOGo groupware integration for calendar and contacts sync (CalDAV/CardDAV)
Custom rate limiting and queue management for bulk sending
Advanced logging with ELK stack for compliance requirements
Email archiving solution for regulatory compliance
Two-factor authentication (2FA) for admin and users
Custom SPF/DKIM rotation for enhanced deliverability
Priority support: 60 days of post-delivery technical assistance
Quarterly maintenance checklist and security audit recommendations

guarantees.text: 99.9% email deliverability with proper DNS authentication
Automatic SSL/TLS certificates with lifetime renewal
Advanced spam and malware protection configured
Automated backup system included in all packages
Full data privacy, your emails stay on your server
